## Areas

### Country (EEZ)

Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) based on [Maritime Boundaries Geodatabase](https://marineregions.org/sources.php#mar_bound_0)

[![](https://marineregions.org/images/boundaries/eez_boundaries.png)](https://marineregions.org/sources.php#mar_bound_0)

Citation:

- Flanders Marine Institute (2019). Maritime Boundaries Geodatabase, version 11. Available online at https://www.marineregions.org/. https://doi.org/10.14284/382.

### Sea (IHO)

[International Hydrographic Organisation (IHO) Sea Areas](https://marineregions.org/sources.php#mar_bound_1)

[![](https://marineregions.org/images/boundaries/IHO_crop_small.png)](https://marineregions.org/sources.php#mar_bound_1)

Citation:

- Flanders Marine Institute (2018). IHO Sea Areas, version 3. Available online at https://www.marineregions.org/. https://doi.org/10.14284/323.

### Eco-region (MEOW+PPOW)

Marine Ecoregions of the World (MEOW) & Pelagic Provinces of the World (PPOW)

### Eco-place (EBSA)

## Values

### Biodiversity (BBNJ)

- Global Marine Biodiversity Index (GMBI) from AquaMaps for United Nations (UN) Biodiversity Beyond National Jurisdiction (BBNJ) 
  - funded by Pew with Benioff
  - 0.5 degree global cells

Also MCI High Seas Mapper

### Impacts (CIA)

[Cumulative Impact Assessment](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/globalmarine) (CIA), ie Global Map of Human Impacts to Marine Ecosystems (Halpern et al 2008): 

- [Model](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/globalmarine2008/model)
- [Impacts](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/globalmarine2008/impacts)
- [Ecosystems](https://www.nceas.ucsb.edu/globalmarine2008/ecosystems)
- 1km global in Mollweide projection

### Fish (SAUP)

[Sea Around Us Project](http://www.seaaroundus.org/) (SAUP)

- [api.openfisheries.org](https://github.com/OpenFisheries/api.openfisheries.org)
- [ropensci/seaaroundus](https://github.com/ropensci/seaaroundus)

### Fishing (GFW)

- [Global Fishing Watch](https://globalfishingwatch.org) (GFW)
  - [Downloadable fisheries data](https://globalfishingwatch.org/datasets-and-code/)
